original_text: After Josiah had done all those things for the temple, King Necho of Egypt marched out with his army. He came to fight a battle at Carchemish, a city beside the Euphrates river. King Josiah went with his army to fight against King Necho.
korean_text: 이 모든 일 후 곧 요시야가 성전을 정돈하기를 마친 후에 애굽 왕 느고가 유브라데 강 가의 갈그미스를 치러 올라왔으므로 요시야가 나가서 방비하였더니

sentences.original_text: After Josiah had done all those things for the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 요시야가 성전을 위해 그 모든 일을 한 후에

sentences.original_text: King Necho of Egypt marched out with his army
sentences.korean_translation: 애굽 왕 느고가 그의 군대와 함께 진군했다

sentences.original_text: He came to fight a battle at Carchemish
a city beside the Euphrates river
King Josiah went with his army
sentences.korean_translation: 요시야 왕이 그의 군대와 함께 갔다
